data.text: Royal Savoy is fantastic. It was our second time here - but I think not the last. Fantastic place to relax. Strongly recommended! Beautiful garden, terrific pools, beautiful private beach, superclean, close to soho. Food was may be not 5 stars - but everything else is outstanding. Rooms are the best I ever experienced. Fantastic value for your money!
data.title: Perfect week

data.text: Wonderful hotel with beach access to reef full of wonderful coloured fish and best of all the service received from all the staff Ahmad at beach, Isaac at breakfast and lounge bar, Tarek at beach and pool, Islam at the lounge bar and lobby and finally Samy pool and bar was superb. Wonderful place to go in November.
data.title: Paradise in November

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Distinguished Guest,
Thank you for taking the time to share with us your recent experience at Royal Savoy Sharm El Sheikh
We're all more than happy to hear that your recent stay with us was pleasant and most importantly our level of service has met your expectations.
Ideally, your review is quite valuable to us; we pay genuine attention to all our guest's comments and reviews.
Once again, we thank you and we look forward to welcoming you for another pleasant stay at our hotel to provide you with the fine service and facilities for which the ROYAL SAVOY name is known.
Kind Regards,
Royal Savoy Team
owner_response.author: Guest service  support

data.text: A wonderful vacation!The service is impeccable, the care of the staff is felt in every detail.The hotel has a special atmosphere of bliss and comfort.I would especially like to mention the service on the beach, the guys do their job perfectly.We will definitely come back again!
data.title: Only Royal Savoy!!!

data.text: This hotel is perfect. It's amazing value for money. The food was first class in every restaurant we visited and the staff were so friendly and attentative. Special mention to the lovely pool bar staff Ahmed and George who looked after us beautifully!!! 5 stars all round!
data.title: Fabulous hotel with amazing staff

data.text: Lovely hotel we keep going back to. Pampered from the minute you arrive. All the staff are great & special mention to Khaled & George at the pool bar. All the restaurants on site serve great food &the waiters are really attentive. There is a sauna & jacuzzi near the pools & a beach nearby in the grounds which are beautifully kept. The rooms are spacious with a balcony. Fruit/ gateau & bottles of water left in the room daily. We will be going back next year!
data.title: Great early break in the sun in the royal savoy Sharm
